# Time to Work

The time remaining in the formal workshop can be used for getting started on your portfolio or getting feedback on a portfolio you already have started.


|**ACTIVITY 4**  Getting to Work (20 minutes)| 
|------------|
|Join the room that best fits your current needs:|
|* Main room: critiquing example portfolios |
|* Breakout rooms: working on individual portfolios (3-5 people)|
